scripts.build: npm run validate && rollup -c && sd pack fr.twitchat.sdPlugin --force
scripts.logs: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = 'fr.twitchat.sdPlugin/logs/fr.twitchat.0.log'; let watcher = null; let pos = 0; const watch = () => { if(watcher) { watcher.close(); watcher = null; } if(fs.existsSync(path)) { pos = fs.statSync(path).size; watcher = fs.watch(path, (e) => { if(e === 'change') { try { const fd = fs.openSync(path, 'r'); const buf = Buffer.alloc(fs.statSync(path).size - pos); if(buf.length > 0) { fs.readSync(fd, buf, 0, buf.length, pos); process.stdout.write(buf); } pos += buf.length; fs.closeSync(fd); } catch(err) {} } }); console.log('Watching:', path); } }; watch(); fs.watch(require('path').dirname(path), { persistent: true }, () => { if(!fs.existsSync(path) && watcher) { watcher.close(); watcher = null; console.log('File deleted, waiting...'); } else if(fs.existsSync(path) && !watcher) { watch(); } }); setInterval(() => {}, 1000);"
